main event: A witness reported seeing an oval, flat object larger than a basketball that changed color from white to orange in Arlington, VA on December 10, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes before disappearing when the observer went inside to report it., At least four aircraft were present in the area over Bolling field during the sighting., The witness was a 23-year-old secretary who described the object as significant due to its size and color change., The report included the evaluation that the object might be an experimental USAF reconnaissance aircraft., No definitive conclusions were reached regarding the nature of the object due to insufficient data.
sighted object: oval but flat object larger than a basketball, white turning orange
